description: Collects : X-Men (1991) #94 "Test To Destruction" - Uncanny X-Men (1981) # 380 - X-Men Unlimited (1993) #26 "Full Circle"
Collects : X-Men (1991) #102 - Uncanny X-Men (1981) # 381 - Magneto Dark Seduction (2000) #01
name: Nuova Serie n.2

description: In issue #12, Batman begins connecting Luthor, Brainiac, the Exobytes and the survivors from The Daily Planet. But will he be in time to help Superman's worsening condition?
name: ...Clark Kent Is Superman!

description: Looks like bad times for Umma Kurtha, which agency has specialized to interfere real freaks. But than the vatican comes into play and Umma goes on a search to find the first human, which was created with the M.Y.P.

It's Batman and Red Robin vs. The Architect as the villain tears through Gotham City's first families! Plus, who is Nicholas Anders? The team continues to investigate the mysterious man from turn-of-the twentieth-century Gotham, but what they find may change everything they know about the city itself!

Batman: Gates of Gotham #3 begins with another entry from the journal of Nicholas Anders. Nicholas Anders would talk about the significance of the Wayne Tower, how it became a symbol of the future. Meanwhile Nicholas would get married and have a child. Alan proposed to create a bridge that will connect Gotham to another county. Then Alan Wayne tells Nicholas that him and Bradley "family".

In present day, Dick talks about how he failed Gotham and how Bruce would of never have let it get that far. Red Robin did a 3D rending of the steampunk suit so he could search it. The penguin then comments to Batman that the rumors of true about him slipping.

In the past, Nicholas talks to Bradley who disapproves of this new project. Nicholas tells Bradley that Alan called "family" then Bradley notes that no one becomes a Wayne, Elliot or a Cobblepot and they only treat them like family until they aren't not useful anymore. Bradley does agree to join Nicholas on this venture.

In the Present, Dick, Tim, Damian, Cassandra discuss the suit used. They discover it is an 1800s construction workers suit, and how it was discontinued when an incident that ended in Robert Kane's death. Dick thinks about how Tim was a better Robin and how he will be a better Batman. Then Tim talks about the suits and they were designed by Nicholas and Bradley Gate. The most current person to use the suit is a man by the name of Dillon May.

In the past, Nicholas Anders is invited to a meeting with Alan, Theodore, Edward and Cameron Kane. Nicholas was asked where the Bridge would lead to. Cameron Kane wanted the bridge lead to Kane County. Nicholas decided with Alan Wayne.

In the present. Dick and Cassandra go to the Elliot building and looking through files looking for clues. Dick figures out that the next target is the Kane Bridge. Tim and Damian are in Dillon May's home looking for other clues, then they are surprised by Dillion May who is the Architect.

In the past, Nicholas is working on the bridge and the bridge collapses and Bradley is killed in the incdient.
name: Part Three: The Key to the City

description: Batman uses both his wits and brute force to deal with new and old enemies alike. Will Two-Face find his coin? Does the Riddler finally get the skeleton key to his locked memories? Is there a new power hierarchy about to reign in Gotham City? Find out in the stunning conclusion of the 3-part "Pieces."
name: Pieces, Part Three: Gilded Lily

description:
An experiment at MIT has had an unexpected success and generated a mutant strain of mosquitoes that sow terror and death, between Boston, New York and Cape Cod. In this seaside resort there will be a real duel between Martin and the “queen” of the deadly mosquito swarm.

Then a story begins that will see Mystère on the tracks of the Sasquatch, the "Bigfoot" of the Rocky Mountains ...
name: L'orrenda invasione

description: The Detective of the Impossible is dealing with a classic mystery of the North American continent: the Sasquatch, or the legendary Man of the Woods. During an expedition in the forests near Willow Creek, Martin Mystere finds disconcerting explanation about the existence of this cousin of the best known American Yeti.
name: L'uomo dei boschi

description: THIS SUMMER, THE DEVIL IS REBORN. RENEWED. RESURRECTED. With new enemies, new friends…and that same old 'grinnin' in the face of hell' attitude, The Man Without Fear is back in a double-sized first issue and leading with his face! Mark Waid (AMAZING SPIDER-MAN, Irredeemable, RUSE) joins neo-legendary artists Paolo Rivera and Marcos Martin for a new spin on Daredevil that will leave you gasping for air. Having turned his world upside over the past several years, Matt Murdock realizes that justice may not be blind to his past and villains may not be the only ones looking for answers. Bring it on. If Matt Murdock could see what he was doing... he'd be terrified. Then Daredevil realizes he was being followed by an old friend.

Mystère offers to help her friend Sarah, expelled from the Gypsy community as a result of the disappearance of three incisions, one of which depicts the emblem of Atlantis . The author of the theft appears to be Sergei Orloff , interested to track down the hideout of the complete collection of engravings .
name: Il libro di Toth

description: Called by his friend Von Hansen in Sardinia, Martin, Diana and Java find the archaeologist in a coma at the hospital of Nuoro. The doctors do not pronounce on the causes of coma and Mystere has to reconstruct the movements of the last hours of his friend. The investigation leads him into the abyss of Golgo, where among tunnels, prehistoric tombs and Etruscan inscriptions, Martin and friends come face to face with the Scultone, a reptilian monster that will try to kill them.
name: Il mistero del nuraghe

description: The Sardinian adventure concludes with the discovery of an ancient secret tied to the Atlantis and Mu and Von Hansen out of the coma . At this point, it’s time for Martin to return to Australia, to follow a new research that begins with the signs of a cosmic event that should occur in coincidence with the twentieth anniversary of the death of his father , Mark Mystère , which took place in a plane crash caused by the Men in Black.
name: Moha-Moha

description: Martin Mystere, Java and Diana are witnessing disturbing supernatural events, triggered by monstrous creatures that live near a remote village in Andalusia, where a nuclear power plant is under construction. These wonders are part of a mystery that the locals believe to be the Devil's work, and for a scientist such as Martin is, superstition is perhaps a greater danger than any other.
name: Il flauto di Pan

description: The Andalusian adventure ends with the discovery of a truth that concerns neither the devil nor the god Pan , but something even more distant. Back in America, the Detective of the Impossible faces a very peculiar survey: Annabel Lee, a white girl who grew up and lived ( but even her doesn't know exactly when) in New England , wakes up in hospital in the body of Abe White , a strong black man , affected and chased by a gang of criminals.
name: La reincarnazione di Annabel Lee

description: A terrible curse appears to be the cause of the alleged reincarnation of Annabel Lee in the body of Abe White. The man and his accomplices had stolen a golden Maya idol and the Indians, who revered him, have hurled an anathema against them. Martin Mystere, to clarify this enigma, reaches the remote temple where it all began.
name: Il potere dell’idolo

description: Provence, 1550. After being plagued by unexplained visions, a doctor starts to write a series of blocks that contain dark prophecies, and his name is Michel de Notre-Dame, but will go down in history as "Nostradamus". Rome, 2011. Martin Mystere visits a scholar of his knowledge, Professor Mercalli, who has discovered what may be an unknown text by Nostradamus. Mercalli, however, dies in unclear circumstances, and Martin is forced to seek help from an old acquaintance, fascinating Inspector Nadia De Pascali to discover what secret lies behind what has been dubbed "The source of the future".
name: L'uomo che visse nel futuro

description: Struck by a complete amnesia, Martin Mystère, investigates in Rome, together with Commissioner Nadia De Pascali, about the mysterious death of Don Francesco. Meanwhile, an amazing invention by Guglielmo Marconi emerges from the past and, in the shadows, a terrible threat is hanging over the Eternal City.
name: L'uomo senza memoria

description: Martin Mystere meets his "double" in the parallel universe that inspired the works of Jules Verne, and takes his place to save the world from destruction and give back to its inhabitants the freedom of thought and action.
name: Ricordi dal futuro

description: A Valkyrie, " shipwrecked " for several centuries among humans , tries to join his family , while the clone of Brynhild created by Loki wanders the desolate ice of Iceland in search of his home. Martin , Java, and a 140 years old Nazi will contribute, in spite of themselves, to help them, reopening the way for Agarthi .
name: Il sole nero

description: Having broken into a haunted castle to loot its treasures, Conan and his companions discover that stories of the castle's paranormal past may have been exaggerated. But that doesn't mean that fabricated ghost stories can't be used to their advantage when Conan discovers they aren't the only thieves out for the gold!

The discovery of a mummified body in an archaeological site in Yemen and the move of Java to live with Mary Ossowiecki are just the beginning of a tragic adventure of spells , rituals , texts and other cursed worlds .
name: Java, addio!

description:
Dark Horse's essential chapter in the story of Id Software's hotly anticipated game Rage continues!

The Authority has seized power and is carrying out cruel "experiments" on radiation victims, but when a scientist discovers the true extent of its deceptions, she finds herself an enemy of the state, with only a fledgling resistance to turn to. Arvid Nelson ( Rex Mundi) and Andrea Mutti ( DMZ) delve deeper into the secrets of Rage, working directly with the game's creative director, Tim Willits, in a new take on postapocalyptic intrigue!
name: After The Impact Part 2 Of 3

description: As Shinku's one-woman war against the vampire clan continues! The lone surviving member of her samurai family, Shinku invades the vampire stronghold in modern Tokyo. But what does she seek in the lair of her enemies?
name: Throne Of Blood Part Two

description: The writer Howard Phillips Lovecraft imagined that, in ancient times, our planet was populated by foul deities, including the infinitely repulsive and evil Cthulhu. But was it just imagination? Beyond the threshold of a forgotten temple in the Middle East, that horror has awaited for millenia to be able to unleash.
name: L'orrore oltre la soglia

description: Collects : X-Men (1991) #103 - Uncanny X-Men (1981) # 383 - Magneto Dark Seduction (2000) #03
name: Chi li guiderà

description: Inside Arkham City, entrapped criminals have to find new ways to keep themselves occupied. In Bane's case, he's biding his time by running an extreme fighting ring. The lack of serious competition leaves him frustrated, until an otherwise lackluster opponent produces a big surprise. The result may inspire Bane to take on deadlier hobbies.
name: Chapter Five: Fall of the Titan

description: Collects : X-Men (1991) #104 - Uncanny X-Men (1981) # 384 - Magneto Dark Seduction (2000) #04
name: Nuova Serie n.5

description: The legendary fallen angel returns to comics. As New York City's sins are covered with a fresh blanket of snow, the psychotic serial killer, Torment, is hard at work creating new ones. Meanwhile, Avengelyne has her hands full with the Red Dragon who has taken a human vessel in search of a new apprentice. Who has the Dragon chosen as his vessel and does it have anything to do with Avengelyne's new look? All this plus the introduction of the stunning, Heaven Starr! AVENGELYNE is a new ongoing supernatural series written by MARK POULTON (Koni Waves) with art by OWEN GIENI and letters and color assists by DEXTER WEEKS.
name: Devil in the Flesh, Part 1 of 3

description: Don't miss this new tale of the early days of Superman and Batman's partnership! Someone has gotten close to finding out the true identity of Batman, and now that person has turned up dead! Superman is about to discover just how gray the world of The Dark Knight really is.
name: The Secret, Part 2 of 3

description:
FEAR ITSELF TIE-IN

The Academy teachers must battle not one, but two hammer-wielders at the same time! Meanwhile, the horrors of war take their toll on the students, as one of them is pushed ever further towards a life-changing decision! Don't miss the shocking events that will rock the book that IGN.com calls “the under-appreciated gem of the Avengers franchise."
name: Fear Itself, Chapter 2: A God-Awful Small Affair

description: This 3d edition of Spawn #1 was created in celebration of the TODD MCFARLANE RETROSPECTIVE EXHIBIT taking place at THE MUSEUM OF COMIC AND CARTOON ART in New York City 2006.
name: Questions

description: Trouble for G.I. Joe! As Firefly and Crystal Ball prepared their insidious operation to infiltrate a G.I. Joe stronghold located in the heart of the Chrysler building, an arctic Joe team was ambushed by Cobra and taken prisoner. But all is not lost: Blizzard evades the ambush and prepares to head in, guns a-blazing! This is one issue of G.I. Joe: Real American Hero you can't afford to miss!

volume.name: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero

description:
An Avengers strike-force consisting of Spider-Woman, Ms. Marvel, The Protector is dispatched to Brazil to take on a possessed Hulk.

The battle is interspersed with interviews with various members of various current Avengers teams, discussing Spider-Woman's need to prove herself as an Avenger and atone for her past with Hydra.
name: Fear Itself, part 3 Rumble in the Jungle !

description:
Speedball desperately races across the world, trying to unite pockets of resistance against the Serpent...but as the Serpent's forces strike back, and innocent lives are lost, is he only bringing about his own greatest fear? PLUS: Jimmy Woo's world unravels as he pieces together a puzzle he didn't even know he was part of! Is ultimate knowledge worth the price of his sanity? And can the Blue Marvel fight what the Serpent has wrought in the trenches?

Story Titles

  • Speedball in "Fatal Errors" part 4 of 7
  • Jimmy Woo [and the Agents of Atlas] in "The Age of Anxiety" part 4 of 4
  • A Moment With... Kida of Atlantis
  • The Blue Marvel in "Legacy"
name: Speedball in "Fatal Errors" part 4 of 7; Jimmy Woo [and the Agents of Atlas] in "The Age of Anxiety" part 4 of 4;  A Moment With... Kida of Atlantis; The Blue Marvel in "Legacy"

volume.name: MU: The Land That Never Was

description: War Machine and the Immortal Weapons battle to save Beijing from a demon invasion!
name: Fear Itself

description: General Ross returns to Manhattan just in time to come to blows with a hammer-possessed The Thing... while his mounting array of foes watch from the wings.
name: Planet of Fear, Pt. 1
